title: Tata Motors expects improved domestic sales during festive season as global demand remain muted for some time
description: Tata Motors reported its quarterly results, indicating a projected slow improvement in global demand and a gradual rise in domestic demand driven by infrastructure investments and seasonal factors. The automaker saw an 11% decline in total sales in July year-on-year, with domestic sales also down by 11% from the previous year.
